channel.title: Netrix 667 - Great ECONOMY / GE / VPS hosted / ALL SKILLS WORKING
channel.description:
About Netrix
Netrix is a 667+ Runescape Economy server which is online 24/7. It is Owned and developed by Aloha . Netrix has many different activities and more are being developed everyday. We have very friendly players who will help you and almost every suggestion we get turns into new update to help the server grow.
Some of the main PvM activities include:
•Godwars • Nex • Corporal Beast and the core • Bork • Pest Queen • Jad • Tormented Demons • Barrows • King Black Dragon • new Queen Black Dragon • Chaos Elemental • Dominion Tower • Revenants in 50 wild Multi PvP.
We also have many PvP locations areas such as:
•Clan wars red portal • Easts and West dragons • Edgeville • Chaos Altar multi • Revenants 50 wild multi.
Skilling
Netrix isn't just a PvP and PvM Server we also have heaps of skilling areas and everyskill but Construction is trainable Including: •Dungeoneering • Slayer • Summoning. The Grand Exchange is very helpful for skilling as you can buy almost all of your supplies or equipment there. We have multiple skilling areas for you to train at and also have some XP lamps you can work for to gain a boost.
Forum.
[url=http://explote09.metrohosting.info]http://explote09.metrohosting.info[/url]
Home. [URL=http://"http://netrixrsps.weebly.com/"]http://netrixrsps.weebly.com/[/URL]
Media: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3391116/working_ge.png[/img] --> working GE [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3391122/nex.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3391384/50_prestige_levels.png[/img] 50 prestige levels as u can see on picture [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3394468/nomad.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3394452/working_farming.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3394470/fog_shop.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3394465/dung.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3395210/dicezone_.png[/img]
NOTE: I DONT OWN THIS SERVER, DEVELOPER AND OWNER IS ALOHA
